Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $8000 to me due to its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship. This product has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards, ensuring exceptional performance and durability. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire it at a special introductory price of $7200. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to respond promptly if you are interested. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to the possibility of serving you with this exceptional item. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
